question.title: Issue with @ConfigurationProperties and @Value when used together in spring
question.body:
I'm using @ConfigurationProperties and @Value both with record class (Java 21 & Spring Boot starter 3.2.2). But the properties with @Value is populating as null. I've came across few thread which explains the Nested properties scenario here - Spring Inject Values with @ConfigurationProperties and @Value

Can anyone help me understanding why is this not working for me?

application.yaml

abc:
  property1: value1
  property_name2: value2

Record

@ConfigurationProperties(prefix = "abc")
public record Model(
   String property1,
   @Value("${property_name2}") String property2) {
}

Output:

Model[property1=value1, property2=null]
